SEARCH
Package beans

Class FriendBean

java.lang.Object
beans.FriendBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Named @SessionScoped public class FriendBean extends Object implements Serializable
Bean for managing friendships. Provides functionality to retrieve, add, and remove friends.
Author:
Arthur PHOMMACHANH - xphomma00
